Options.OPTION[AssetIconLibrary.AssetIco: ⚠️  Changing these settings requires restarting your game to apply your changes.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetIconLibr: While enabled, Asset Icon Library will overwrite vanilla assets' icons, even if the assets have an icon already.
Change what style to use for asset icons where applicable.
Options.OPTION[AssetIconLibrary.AssetIco: Use custom icons for assets by placing the image files with the assets' name inside the custom thumbnails folder.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetIconLibr: Add personal custom thumbnails to use over the vanilla or 'Asset Icon Library' icons.
